title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Is There a Book In Your Investigation?
description: David Cay Johnston discusses the process of writing an investigation as a book, highlighting the differences between a book and an article, the importance of a narrative and compelling characters, and the need for a marketing plan and budget.
